name: Tikotep Adventure Demo
description:
@alwex_biotronik

Tikotep's adventure is a action/adventure platformer game backed up by a strong storyline.

You play Tikotep, a young indian boy who will have to face his own destiny and unveil the truth as mysterious events begin to change his world forever.He will encounter many foes on his long and perilous journey, but there are some evils that should not be awakened ...

You can follow the dev log on tigsource
